page.title: 19THE ANTIQUE SHOP
page.content:
The Antique Shop, Swanley lane, Ravensmoor. Proprietor: Mrs Booth
The owner has been an antique dealer since 1969 and has another shop in Nantwich. She always wanted to be an antique dealer and enjoys her work. It is a small shop, but very popular with tourists, many of whom come every year. She sells different kinds of antiques from alarm clocks to grandfather clocks, from horse brasses to furniture. The most expensive antique she has ever sold was a dresser. The most famous person to ever visit the shop was Brian Cart. Her favourite hobby is golf. If she could go anywhere in the world for a holiday she would go to Hong Kong.
